lead_paragraph: Citigroup’s new executive pay plan raises the bar, just not quite far enough. The bank’s board has put into effect a compensation scheme with more rigorous targets for the chief executive, Michael L. Corbat, and his lieutenants. One important performance metric, however, keeps expectations too low.

headline.main: Citigroup Pay Plan Raises the Bar Just a Bit
